Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 78th overall pick, by Boston (FBA) in 1978...
Injured on 8/3/1981 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/15/1984, off Tom Meagher (Min)...
Earned first career win on 6/22/1984...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1985...
Traded from Boston (FBA) to Capital City on 4/2/1987 (Going to SHP: 2B M. Moreno. Going to CC: P J. Fried, P C. Chesson Jr.)...
